data.title: What was Gene Hackman's dog's name in "Crimson Tide"?
data.text:
How many Academy Awards did "The Godfather" win?

Movie Trivia / August 19, 2024

3. Out of it's 10 nominations....G.F.1 won 3 Oscars

Who starred as an aging stuntman in the movie "Hooper"?

Movie Trivia / August 19, 2024

Burt Reynolds. Burt Reynolds played Coach Nate Scarborough in the 2005 version of "the Longest Yard".

Who played the surprise guest in the movie "Guess Who's Coming to Dinner"?

Movie Trivia / August 18, 2024

Sidney Poitier. Sidney Poitier won an Oscar for his role in "Lilies of the Field" in 1963.

In what film did Nick Metropolis play TV Scientist?

Movie Trivia / August 18, 2024

Husbands And Wives. "Husbands and Wives" was directed by Woody Allen.

Who starred with Andrew McCarthy in "Mannequin" and "Less Than Zero"?

Movie Trivia / August 17, 2024

James Spader. Brad Pitt was paid $38 for his uncredited appearance in "Less Than Zero".
